entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow over southern sections this evening and after midnight. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Amount 5 cm near the American border. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
